title: Client crashes about 98% of the time I try to login
body: So, unbeknownst to me, the client (patcher) loads up all fine, no issues there; after I press launch and the login screen shows up, everything is fine but when I login, the "landing page" crashes within about 5 seconds.  Also, this always occurs, when i load up to the first game of the client that finally lets me in, I get stuck on the champion select screen while everyone else is in the loading screen.  Any advice would be greatly appreciated. (Mac by the way.)

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having hiccups and can't maintain a stable connection to the game.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good.  Make sure to select the Mac option for troubleshooting specific to your Mac.  Hope that helps out!
